scripts.postinstall: sh -c 'chmod +x node_modules/.bin/next node_modules/next/dist/bin/next' || powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem node_modules/.bin/next,node_modules/next/dist/bin/next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { (Get-Item $_.FullName).Attributes = 'Archive' }" || true

sh -c 'chmod +x node_modules/.bin/next node_modules/next/dist/bin/next' || powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem node_modules/.bin/next,node_modules/next/dist/bin/next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { (Get-Item $_.FullName).Attributes = 'Archive' }" || true
